TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Lifetime extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse elemento opcional é usado em `wst:RequestSecurityToken` ou `wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse` mensagens para indicar o tempo de vida necessário ou desejado de um token.This optional element is used in `wst:RequestSecurityToken` or `wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse` messages to indicate the desired or required lifetime of a token. Todos os horários são especificados na hora UTC.All times are specified in UTC time. [!INCLUDE[wif_wstrust_ref](~/includes/wif-wstrust-ref-md.md)]
